{{Infobox Network Switch |image1 = Ubiquiti Networks TOUGHSwitch PoE.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = TOUGHSwitch PoE |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Ubiquiti_Networks_TOUGHSwitch_PoE |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Ubiquiti Networks |model = TS-5-POE |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/22/2014 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Ubiquiti_Networks_TOUGHSwitch_PoE |series = <!-- Device series --> |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification -->
|fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Baord ID --> |ethoui = <!-- ethoui -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR7240; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 400<!-- 350 / 400 MHz --> |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|sw1chip = Atheros;AR8327; |sw2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|eth_ports = 5 |eth_speed = 1GbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |auto_mdix = supported |sup_jumbo = yes |sw_class = managed
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIExpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = <!-- Type of POE --> |pwr_poe = 24 |pwr_poe_amp = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|defaulip = 192.168.1.20 |defaultlogin = ubnt |defaultpass = ubnt |is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = PoE Switch |accessible_UART =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |upc = 799632084358 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |asin = B00HXT8QKC |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== ===Additional specifications, per UBNT's QSG=== *Management port: 1x 10/100 Ethernet *PoE capabilities: Off/24V over all switched ports *Weight: [[Weight::250 g]] *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::197 mm x 87.5 mm x 27.3 mm]]
==Links of Interest== [http://dl.ubnt.com/guides/toughswitch/TOUGHSwitch_PoE_5-Port_QSG.pdf Quick Start Guide]
